column5: THIS MASTER'S IN COMPUTER SCIENCE FOCUSES ON BOTH THE DEVELOPMENT OF ICT SYSTEMS IN THEIR SOCIETAL CONTEXT AND THE TECHNOLOGICAL ASPECTS AND APPLICATIONS OF EMBEDDED SYSTEMS.ICT is omnipresent in modern society. The latest hardware and software developments are crucial in domains such as social media, security, health, energy, ICT systems, finance and telecom. That's why this Master's focuses on the development of ICT systems in their societal context and also on technological aspects and applications of embedded systems.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
